name: Objection.lol Project
summary: An OBJECTION file is a project file created by objection.lol Objection Maker, a tool that allows users to create custom Ace Attorney objection videos. It contains a record of the frames a user's video project contains, including each frame's character, pose, text, and other information. Users can play back the video an OBJECTION file describes in Objection Maker.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: OBJECTION file open in objection.lol Objection Maker
